name: Lilac Way
description:
Made at GBC Jam #6 - Hope

Game by Carlo Albino

Music by Jérémie Albino - www.jeremiealbinomusic.com

All other assets from the Unity Asset store

CONTROLS

WASD to move

Mouse to look

Left click to interact

ESC or Right click to back out of interactions

CTRL + Q to quit the game

See the 12 hour jam induced, panicked code here: https://github.com/CarloAlbino/GBCJam6
